Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 45 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 162[Air Date: 8/5/1985] [3]--Connection [4]--Rock Hudson
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 45 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 162[Air Date: 8/5/1985] [3]--Connection [4]--Rock Hudson

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Reagan administration seeks more AIDS funding2. North Carolina blocks anti-gay legislationCOMMERCIAL: "The Connection," gay and lesbian newspaper3. HTLVIII confidentiality in Wisconsin4. Johnson & Johnson orders a cease a desist on San Diego AIDS Project education campaign, Ban AIDS5. HPA23, United States unfamiliar with drug, popular in France COMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp6. Rock Hudson and AIDS7. California court rejects lovers benefits claims8. Refusal to hire or house Oklahoma sexual criminals, counts sodomy as crime9. Gay Pride Parade coverageCOMMERCIAL: NGTF Fund for Human Dignity [with Judge Steven Lax, judge of Los Angeles Superior Court]10. Sports11. Healthline: Conversations with GMHC: Martin P. Levine returns, assistant professor of Sociology at Bloomfield College, discusses health and safe sex12. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Sybil Bruncheon at Gracie MansionCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape," a gay magazine2. Ed Koch stands up Sybil BruncheonCOMMERCIAL: Carnaval in Rio de Janeiro, Islanders' Club3. Sybil Bruncheon reads letterCOMMERCIAL:["Your Testicles and You"]4."If This Isn't Love" review, includes clipCOMMERCIAL: Arcos Blancos Resort, San Juan, Puerto Rico5. Broadway Confidential: Cocoon, Prizzi's HonorCOMMERCIAL: World of Video6. "Vampire Lesbians of Sodom"7. Closing credits
